column4: Ya 1GB swap is more than enough for most of the users...even with hibernation...
the theory twice as RAM goes only for <1GB RAM
no, not "even with hibernation" -- swap MUST be > RAM for hibernation
So is there any way out to hide a opened terminal with command and show it up again??
you could use alltray to run it in the systray and then be able to retrieve it from there...but meh thats no different than just minimising
Ya ya sending it to tray would to...what to use?? alttray??
Thanks maco, I'd like to know another thing, is their any way out like whenever I start the program it'll get started in alltray and then use it as normally as we do with tray applications??
start it with alltray. like "alltray firefox"
Thanks a lot buddy, it did my job :)
Sorry for the trouble though, I should have stated my goal instead :(
